quoteText: Quality means doing it right when no one is looking.
Myths which are believed in tend to become true.
No matter how deep a study you make. What you really have to rely on is your own intuition and when it comes down to it, you really don't know whats going to happen until you do it.
Remember that sometimes not getting what you want is a wonderful stroke of luck.
If you seek truth you will not seek victory by dishonourable means, and if you find truth you will become invincible.
Write your plans in pencil and give God the eraser.
